title: Typophile Redesign
content:
Please, please, please return to the previous design!!!!  
I beg you!  
Not that it is bad, but the old one was lightyears better, more serious and ideal for its purpose.  
Please!

Stefan

PS  
Seriously, if it stays this way, I don’t know wether I will participate in the future..

 [‹ Big-Time Slimbach Fan Nabbed for Stalking](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907045259/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43784 "Go to previous forum topic") [Big Foundries in Europe ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907045259/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43766 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Stefan Seifert

comments.content:
Have you considered todays date, Stefan?

;^D

And see [more comments on it here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907045259/http:/typophile.com/node/43755) and [here, too](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907045259/http:/typophile.com/node/43758) …
-=®=- The Internet equivalent of Seran Wrap on the toilet bowl.
Wow. They got me! This is horrible.
If you can’t appreciate the new design you are fnord obviously a terrorist…
The real April Fools day winner is Youtube which has successfully rick rolled to many people!

<cite>The Internet equivalent of Seran Wrap on the toilet bowl.</cite>

So that’s why it looks like somebody pissed all over everything.

- Lex

P.S. YouTube wins the prize this year I think.
